room_title: Escape room "Clue Me In!" by NWA Escape Room in Fayetteville (AR)
room_description: Your group are all distant relatives of the elderly "Mr. Peabody" invited to visit his secluded estate for the weekend to hear the terms of his new will. Sadly, Mr. Peabody is murdered one afternoon, but it seems like everyone has an alibi. The Police have been called but it will take an hour for them to get there. In the meantime, you must figure out who it was that killed Mr Peabody, how and where. Question everything and think like detectives, it could have been anyone... maybe even you?
